trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en matrise for kontroll av ActiveX-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The `BaseOCXArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX control array.
trans-unit.target: Den `BaseOCXArray` klassen gir en ekvivalent for kjøring funksjonaliteten til en matrise for Visual Basic 6.0 ActiveX-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Det tilbyr ikke utformingen funksjonene i en Visual Basic 6.0 kontrollen matrise.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_BaseOCXArray" name="BaseOCXArray" href=""> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a `BaseOCXArray`, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: Når du starte en `BaseOCXArray`, må du også kalle den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>metode for å opprette det første elementet i matrisen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.BaseSetIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av tastaturet (kategorien SKIFT + TAB og så videre) eller ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>metoden fokus hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av musen eller ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>metoden fokus hendelser inntreffer i følgende rekkefølge: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere hendelser, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen kommer ut eller får innhenting av musen.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker en museknappen når pekeren over en form vanligvis opphøyer følgende rekke hendelser fra kontrollen: `MouseDown` `Click` `MouseClick` `MouseUp` to Klikk som forekommer Lukk nok tidspunkt, i henhold til musen innstillingene for brukerens operativsystem, genererer en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>hendelsen i stedet for andre `MouseClick` hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>hendelser er logisk overordnede hendelser i en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: De er ofte utløst av andre handlinger, for eksempel å trykke ENTER-tasten når kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens skalert, kan du endre den `sender` -parameteren for den <xref:System.EventArgs>data til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>og få den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>egenskapen (eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>Egenskaper individuelt).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil behandle egendefinerte oppsett, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>hendelsen i stedet for den `Resize` hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>denne hendelsen oppstår som svar på en `Resize` hendelse, men også som svar på andre endringer som påvirker oppsettet for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår hvis den <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>er endret av en programmatisk endring eller bruker samhandling.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du håndtere [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is finished validating.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når kontrollen er validering.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av tastaturet (kategorien SKIFT + TAB og så videre), ved å ringe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>metoder, eller ved å angi egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>for det gjeldende skjemaet, oppstår fokus hendelser i denne rekkefølgen: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>Når du endrer fokus ved hjelp av musen eller ved å kalle metoden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, fokus hendelser inntreffer i denne rekkefølgen: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> `Validated` Hvis egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `false` , den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating>og `Validated` hendelser er undertrykt.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOcxArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>er satt til `true` i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>hendelsen representanten, alle hendelser som vanligvis ville forekommer etter den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating>hendelsen er undertrykt.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseOCXArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>
